name: iPhone 8
description:
Single (Wide) or dual-camera system (Wide, Telephoto).

Up to 14 hours of video playback.

Water resistant to a depth of 1 meter for up to 30 minutes.

4.7” or 5.5” Retina HD display.

name: iPhone XR
description:
Single-camera system 
(Wide).

Up to 16 hours of video playback.

Water resistant to a depth of 1 meter for up to 30 minutes.

6.1” Liquid Retina HD display.

name: iPhone 11
description:
All-new dual-camera system (Ultra Wide, Wide). 

Up to 17 hours of video playback. 

Water resistant to a depth of 2 meters for up to 30 minutes. 

6.1” Liquid Retina HD display.

name: iPhone 11 Pro
description:
All-new triple-camera system (Ultra Wide, Wide, Telephoto). 

Up to 20 hours of video playback. 

Water resistant to a depth of 4 meters for up to 30 minutes. 

5.8” or 6.5” Super Retina XDR display.
